items.title: We Must Protect America as the Last, Best Hope for Freedom
items.description: Religious freedom and freedom of speech make up the engine of self-government and form a bulwark against tyranny. And they need our protection.

items.title: Trump DOJ Drops Cases Against Top MS-13 Leaders
items.description: The deal with Bukele comes with significant strings attached, it turns out.

items.title: Viewpoint Diversity in Higher Education Should Mean More Conservatives
items.description: A few enclaves in a few institutions, while laudable, are not sufficient to combat intellectual homogeneity across the universities.

items.title: The Declaration of Independence Resolves America’s Identity Crisis
items.description: The Declaration is not only a reasoned account for a free people, it is also a source for their honor and glory in death and war.

items.title: Kicking Off America’s 250th at Mount Vernon
items.description: I cannot tell a lie. George, Martha, and their stately home are star attractions.
